stripped_text: When your turn begins, you may trash this asset. If you do, search R&D for an operation and reveal it. (Shuffle R&D after searching it.) Add that operation to HQ.
text: When your turn begins, you may trash this asset. If you do, search R&D for an operation and reveal it. (Shuffle R&D after searching it.) Add that operation to HQ.
title: Gaslight
